name: SpyScape
description:
A Stealth puzzle game for 1-2 players.

Player one is the Spy, an agent attempting to infiltrate a prison complex

Player two is the Prisoner, a character attempting to escape the prison

They must work together and utilize each other's strengths to escape each floor and achieve their individual goals.

Controls:

Player 1: 

- Arrow Keys to move (and to control cameras)

- 'M' to interact

- 'N' to sneak

Player 2:

- WASD to move

- Space Bar to interact (Hold down to drag body)

- Left Shift to sneak

Various mechanics:

- Cameras: swiveled by interacting with a computer, only accessible to the Spy

- Key Cards, Slots, and Doors: Players can pick up key cards off the ground and use them to open certain doors by interacting with key slots.

- Noise: Guards can hear players walking in the level, and may come to investigate. Sneaking reduces the noise the players create.

- Prisoner: Can pick up Key Cards, and pass it to the Spy

- If a guard or camera sees the player in it's field of view (indicated by the red spotlight), the alarm will be triggered.

- When the alarm is triggered, the level will restart, and all progress on the current level will be lost.
